turns.raw_header: It looks like you used the tag !<q> before your message. While this isn't a standard command in most systems, it might be intended to indicate a "quote" or a "question." If you meant to test how I respond to special tags or commands, I'm here to help!
turns.footer: If you have a specific question or want to test something else, please let me know!

parsed_footer.raw: If you have a specific question or want to test something else, please let me know!

turns.raw_header: It appears you're experimenting with tags like !<o> before your messages. While this isn't a standard syntax I'm programmed to recognize, I'm happy to interpret it as an indicator for a specific type of messageâ€”perhaps "output," "option," or something else.
turns.footer: If you have a particular purpose for these tags or want me to respond in a certain way when you use them, please let me know! Otherwise, I'm here to help with any questions or tests you have.
